Package it.polimi.se2019.view.gui

Class GuiHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.view.gui.GuiHelper
  • class GuiHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class containing static methods used repeatedly in the GUI.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private GuiHelper()
      A private constructor to prevent the creation of an instance of this class.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) static void applyBorder​(javafx.scene.Node n, int size)
      Applies an InnerShadow to the given node in order to highlight the node.
      (package private) static javafx.scene.Node getNodeByIndex​(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid, int xIndex, int yIndex)
      Gets a node having the specified column and row index from a GridPane
      (package private) static void hueShifter​(java.lang.String color, javafx.scene.effect.ColorAdjust colorAdjust)
      Shifts the hue of a red image to obtain the given color.
      (package private) static void resizeToScreenSize​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane)
      Resize the given Pane to fit the exact size of the screen, in order to support different resolution correctly.
      (package private) static javafx.scene.image.Image rotateImage​(java.lang.Double angle, javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      Receives an image and returns the same image rotated by the given angle.

    • Method Detail

      • rotateImage

        static javafx.scene.image.Image rotateImage​(java.lang.Double angle,
                                            javafx.scene.image.Image image)
        Receives an image and returns the same image rotated by the given angle.
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle to which the image should be rotated
        image - the imaged to be rotated
        Returns:
        the rotated Image

      • getNodeByIndex

        static javafx.scene.Node getNodeByIndex​(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane grid,
                                        int xIndex,
                                        int yIndex)
        Gets a node having the specified column and row index from a GridPane
        Parameters:
        grid - the GridPane from which the node should be retrieved
        xIndex - the ColumnIndex of the desired node
        yIndex - the RowIndex of the desired node
        Returns:
        the node contained in GridPane having the specified parameters

      • hueShifter

        static void hueShifter​(java.lang.String color,
                       javafx.scene.effect.ColorAdjust colorAdjust)
        Shifts the hue of a red image to obtain the given color. It modifies the given ColorAdjust that should be applied to the ImageView.
        Parameters:
        color - the desired color that the image should have after the ColorAdjust
        colorAdjust - the ColorAdjust to be applied to the ImageView

      • applyBorder

        static void applyBorder​(javafx.scene.Node n,
                        int size)
        Applies an InnerShadow to the given node in order to highlight the node.
        Parameters:
        n - the node to be highlighted
        size - the desired width and height of the InnerShadow

      • resizeToScreenSize

        static void resizeToScreenSize​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane)
        Resize the given Pane to fit the exact size of the screen, in order to support different resolution correctly.
        Parameters:
        pane - the pane to be resized
